sentences.sContent: I’d have asked more questions, but I didn’t want to seem inquisitive.
sentences.sCn: 我本想问更多的问题，但我不想看上去那么爱打听。

synos.tran: 好奇的；好问的，爱打听的

remMethod.val: in + quisit(询问) + ive → 不断询问的 → 好奇的

trans.tranCn: 好奇的；好问的，爱打听的
trans.tranOther: asking too many questions and trying to find out too many details about something or someone
